description:
Welcome to 15/16 !

In this game, you have to follow the beat of the song to avoid dangers by jumping.
Sadly, Dr. Green hacked our Game and added dangerous traps that might trick you into jumping when you don't have to or not jumping when you have to . Whatever you do, remember that everything is not as it seems. It might take a few try... Just a few, he said.

Game made for the Rage Jam 2018 - a 48h challenge 

Graphics, music, level design: RavaTroll (https://twitter.com/RavaTroll)
Development, level design: Lucasnonime (https://twitter.com/Lucasnonime)
DM us for any questions

- Launching the game :

First unzip the archive.
In order to play our game, you just have to open 1516.jar
which must be in the same folder as the res folder

You must have Java installed !

Controls :

: Jump
: Reset 

You can reset while playing.

Score :

Your High Score will be the number of blocks you walked.
The Death count increases at each reset.

Known bugs :

There might be sync issues (but we all know it's because of Dr. Green).
